name: Retake the Snake! The Russo-Ukraine War at Sea
name_original: Retake the Snake! The Russo-Ukraine War at Sea
description: The land war in Ukraine is dragging on, with no sign of a cease-fire in sight.  To restart the Ukrainian economy, it is imperative that you find a way to reopen the port of Odessa on the Black Sea.  Currently, the Russian Navy is blocking access to the bulk freighters that could transport Ukrainian grain to markets in the Middle East and Africa.  Commercial shipping companies will not take the risk of being hit by a Russian anti-ship missile.  The challenge is to find a way to neutralize this anti-ship missile threat.  You can try to destroy the Russian platforms that deliver these missiles with missiles supplied by Ukraine's NATO allies.  You could also try and blind these radar guided missiles using powerful electromagnetic jammers mounted on old Soviet Mil-14 helicopters.  You will also need to destroy the Russian special forces units that have retaken Snake Island.  Finally, you have to find a way to stop Russian cruise missiles from destroying the grain storage facilities along Odessa's waterfront.  This is a tall order because Russia has everything you lack: ships, modern combat aircraft, and submarines.  Nevertheless, you have the tools you need to bring grain to countries on the edge of starvation.  You just need to figure out how to use them.  Good luck!
